summary:
• French authorities have arrested a Russian-Ukrainian individual accused of manufacturing explosive devices.
• The suspect was detained by law enforcement officials in connection with alleged bomb-making activities.
• Further details regarding the investigation and potential motivations behind the suspect's actions remain unclear at this time.

• Allies support PM Modi despite electoral losses.
• India has faced setbacks in its election process.
• The country's low caste groups have influenced the outcome.

• The United Nations' nuclear watchdog agency is urging Iran to collaborate on its nuclear program.
• Iran has been accused of pursuing illicit nuclear activities, sparking concerns about regional stability.
• International pressure is mounting on Iran to comply with international standards regarding nuclear development.

• Israel launches military operation in central Gaza amid escalating tensions.
• Israeli nationalists march through Jerusalem's Old City amidst rising nationalism.
• Biden questions whether Israel is committing war crimes in conflict with Hezbollah.

• Asahi Group Holdings plans to increase its sales in Japan by targeting young people aged 18 to 24 with new products such as low-alcohol beverages.
• The company will launch "Asahi Brew Works" to appeal to younger generations who prefer healthier lifestyles.
• To reach this demographic, Asahi will focus on digital marketing strategies like social media campaigns and influencer partnerships.

• A gunman opened fire on the US embassy in Beirut.
• The attack was met with swift response from the Lebanese military.
• Both the gunman and the soldier were killed in the ensuing exchange of gunfire.

• Israel faces internal conflicts amid growing dissent from lawmakers.
• Prime Minister struggles to maintain unity in the government amidst these challenges.
• The situation may lead to instability and potential changes within the administration.

• A man was arrested in Qatar as part of a "Grindr sting" operation.
• He has been sentenced for his involvement in the incident.
• The details of the case remain unclear at this time.

• Slovak PM accuses opposition of spreading hatred
• Shooting incident blamed by PM on opposition's actions
• No further details provided

- Royal Air Force flypast honors D-Day veterans during their trip to France.
- British veterans celebrate being freed from Nazi occupation in Normandy.
- The tallest waterfall in China is secretly maintained through hidden pipes, officials reveal.
- The King's portrait appears on UK currency, marking his reign as monarch.
- Labour leader Keir Starmer and Conservative politician Rishi Sunak engage in their first televised debate ahead of the UK general elections.

•	Boeing launches long-delayed astronaut capsule.
•	Biden faces criticism from Republicans over his border policy.
•	Air rescue team saves man who fell off a cliff in Los Angeles.
